(in front of you)

(after a while)

(at the rubble)

(in front of you)

(in the chamber)
You enter the chamber and find yourself standing on the edge of a deep chasm. The sound of rushing water comes from a narrow stream that runs along the floor of the chasm. The walls of the chamber are covered in carvings of various scenes from Hell's history.

(suddenly)

(after a while)
The ground stops shaking. You approach the edge of the pit and peer inside, only to be repulsed by a wave of putrid air. You back away from the pit, feeling nauseous and disoriented.

(suddenly)

(after a while)
